game

Class Stage

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Stage

  • public class Stage
extends java.lang.Object
    The Stage class represents the stages that contains entities and makes them "act"
    Author:
    ayu663

      • Stage

        public Stage(int stageNum,
             int x,
             int y,
             int width,
             int height,
             Player p)
        Constructs an instance of Stage
        Parameters:
        stageNum - the stage to construct (1-4)
        x - topLeft x of the stage
        y - topLeft y of the stage
        width - width of the stage
        height - height of the stage
        p - player passed into the stage and to interact there
